qrList.label: New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["Yes","No"] Do you want to delete the current chat?| /qr-arg x {{pipe}}| /ife {: /test left={{arg::x}} right=Yes rule=eq :}| /then {: /newchat delete=true:}| /elseif {: /test left={{arg::x}} right=No rule=eq :}| /then {: /newchat delete=false:}| /else {: /abort :}| /setvar key=tag {{noop}}| /setvar key=tags ["FHN", "FAN", "FBN", "FDHN", "FNHN", "FPN", "(WIP)", "MHN", "MAN", "MBN", "MDHN", "MNHN", "MPN", "FCANINE", "FEQUINE", "MCANINE", "MEQUINE", "TRANSFORM"]| /len {{getvar::tags}}| /setvar key=l {{pipe}}| /setvar key=i 0| /setvar key=t none| /tag-list| /setvar key=lis| /while left=i right={{getvar::l}} rule=lt {: /getvar key=tags index={{getvar::i}} | /setvar key=t {{pipe}}| /ife {: /test left={{getvar::lis}} right={{getvar::t}} rule=in :} | /then {: /tag-remove {{getvar::t}} :}| /addvar key=i 1| :}| /setvar key=normal_form None| /setvar key=transformation None| /buttons labels=["Female", "Male", "Machine"] What gender is the character you are making? | /setvar key=sgender {{pipe}}| /ife {: /test left=sgender right="" rule=eq :} /then {: /:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"| /echo Aborting | /abort :}| /ife {: /test left={{getvar::sgender}} right=Machine rule=eq :}| /then {:/setvar key=stype Machine :}| /else {: /buttons labels=["Human", "Anthro", "Demi-Human", "Beastkin", "Non-Humanoid", "Pokémon", "Machine"] What type of character are you making? | /setvar key=stype {{pipe}}| /ife {: /test left=stype right="" rule=eq :}| /then {: /:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"| /echo Aborting | /abort :}| :}| /buttons labels=["Yes", "No"] Can the character transform between a Human form and Another Form?| /setvar key=tr {{pipe}} | /ife {: /test left=tr right="" rule=eq :}| /then {:/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"| /echo Aborting | /abort:}| /setvar key=species ["Canine", "Equine", "Feline", "Reptilian", "Other"]| /setvar key=type None| /ife {:/test left={{getvar::tr}} right=Yes rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag TRANSFORM| /input rows=8
What are the characters main form?
Example: A werewolf's main form could be Human or Werewolf
| /setvar key=normal_form {{pipe}}| /input rows=8 What are the characters transformed form? (If multiple forms give a comma-separated list)| /setvar key=transformation {{pipe}}| :}| /ife {: /test left={{getvar::sgender}} right=Female rule=eq :}| /then {: /ife {: /test left={{getvar::stype}} right=Human rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag FHN| /setvar key=type Human| :}| /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::stype}} right=Anthro rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag FAN| /buttons labels=species What type of species should the character be? | /setvar key=sspecies {{pipe}}| /ife {: /test left={{getvar::sspecies}} right=Canine rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag ", FCANINE"| /setvar key=type Canine| :}| /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::sspecies}} right=Equine rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag ", FEQUINE"| /setvar key=type Equine| :}| /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::sspecies}} right=Feline rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag ", FFELINE"| /setvar key=type Feline| :}| /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::sspecies}} right=Reptilian rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag ", FREPTILIAN"| /setvar key=type Reptilian| :}| /else {: /input rows=8 What type of anthro species do you want?. (Type \"Random\" without \" if you want the bot to make one one for you.)|/setvar key=other ", {{pipe}}" :}| :}| /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::stype}} right=Beastkin rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag FBN| /buttons labels=species What type of species should the character be? | /setvar key=sspecies {{pipe}}| /ife {: /test left={{getvar::sspecies}} right=Canine rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag ", FCANINE"| /setvar key=type Canine| :}| /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::sspecies}} right=Equine rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag ", FEQUINE"| /setvar key=type Equine| :}| /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::sspecies}} right=Feline rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag ", FFELINE"| /setvar key=type Feline| :}| /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::sspecies}} right=Reptilian rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag ", FREPTILIAN"| /setvar key=type Reptilian| :}| /else {: /input rows=8 What type of Beastkin species do you want?. (Type "Random" without " if you want the bot to make one one for you.)|/setvar key=other ", {{pipe}}" :}| :}| /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::stype}} right=Pokémon rule=eq :}| /then {: /addvar key=tag MPN :} :}| /else {: /addvar key=tag (WIP) :}| /:"Character Maker V4.Is real"| /db-add source=chat name=normal_form {{getvar::normal_form}}| /db-disable source=chat normal_form| /db-add source=chat name=transformation {{getvar::transformation}}| /db-disable source=chat transformation| /db-add source=chat name=tags {{getvar::tag}}| /db-disable source=chat tags| /db-add source=chat name=type {{getvar::type}}| /db-disable source=chat type| /db-add source=chat name=gender {{getvar::sgender}}| /db-disable source=chat gender| /:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"

qrList.label: Character Generator Swipe
qrList.message:
/setvar key=t {{lastmessage}}| /re-replace replace="" find="/Character Maker QR: /g" var=t | /setvar key=p {{pipe}} | /re-replace replace="" find="/(?<=<\/h2>)([\s\S]*)/g" var=p | /setvar key=d {{pipe}} |
/try {:
	/swipes-add {{getvar::d}}|
	/setvar key=swipe Yes|
	/setvar key=new= No|
:}|
/catch  {:
	/setvar key=d <h2 align='center'>Basic Information"|
	/setvar key=swipe No|
	/setvar key=new= Yes|
:}|
/tag-list | /setvar key=list {{pipe}} | 
/messages 0-{{lastMessageId}} |
/setvar key=messageHistory {{pipe}} | 



/ife {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Basic Information" rule=in :}|
	/then {:
		/:"Character Maker V4.01. Generate Basic Information (form)"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Appearance Info" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.02. Generate Appearance Info (Can Generate Multiple)"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Outfit and Gear" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.03. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can Generate Multiple)"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Personality Traits And Quirks" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.04. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Relationship Information" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.05. Generate Relationship Information"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Known Kinks" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.06. Generate Known Kinks"|
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Latent Kinks" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.07. Generate Latent Kinks"|
	:}|

/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Background Info" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.08. Generate Background Info"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Interaction Style" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.09. Generate Interaction Style"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Contextual Information" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.10. Generate Contextual Information"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Additional Notes" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.11. Generate Additional Notes"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Spells and Abilities" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.12. Generate Spells and Abilities"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Character Rules" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/echo Rules does nothing with a swipe. Insted Edit it manualy and add/remove rules to your liking.|
		/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Extras" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.14. Generate Extras"
	:}|
/elseif {: /test left=d right="<h2 align='center'>Scenario" rule=in :}|
	/then {: 
		/:"Character Maker V4.15. Generate Scenario"
	:}
|
/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"

qrList.label: Generate Character Choice
qrList.message:
/setvar key=qr Character Maker V4.|
/buttons labels=["01. Generate Basic Information (form)","02. Generate Appearance Info (Can Generate Multiple)","03. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can Generate Multiple)","04. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks","05. Generate Relationship Information","06. Generate Known Kinks","07. Generate Latent Kinks","08. Generate Background Info","09. Generate Interaction Style","10. Generate Contextual Information","11. Generate Additional Notes","12. Generate Spells and Abilities","13. Copy Character Rules","14. Generate Extras","15. Generate Scenario"] What do you want to do?|
/setvar key=choice {{pipe}}|

/setvar key=new Yes|
/setvar key=swipe No|

/ife {: /test left=choice right="" rule=eq :}|
	/then {:
		/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"|
		/echo Aborting | /abort
	:}|
	
/addvar key=qr {{getvar::choice}}|

/:{{getvar::qr}}|
/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"

qrList.label: Debug On/Off
qrList.message:
/ife {: /test left=debug right=Yes rule=neq :}|
	/then {:
		/setvar key=debug Yes|
		/echo Debug Enabled|
	:}|
/else {:
	/setvar key=debug No|
	/echo Debug Disabled|
:}|
